todos.content: Replace setup.sh provider loop with eavs setup add --batch
Fix prompt_input in eavs to read from /dev/tty (terminal issue)
Fix prompt_input_required to retry instead of crash on empty
Keep oqto.setup.toml custom providers via --import flag
Extract CONFIGURED_PROVIDERS from config file after eavs setup
Model shortlist selection after provider setup
Push eavs + octo repos (SSH key issue in sandbox)
